subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Geno Smith’s most difficult moment yet will come on Sunday, when the Jets, mired in a two-game losing streak and on the outskirts of the A.F.C. playoff race, play Miami.
snippet: Geno Smith’s most difficult moment yet will come on Sunday, when the Jets, mired in a two-game losing streak and on the outskirts of the A.F.C. playoff race, play Miami.
